sentences.en: Are they terms of endearment ? epithets? exclamations? exaggerations?
sentences.cn: 是形容词 吗 ?是感叹词 吗 ?还是夸大其词?

sentences.en: Debra Winger had to say goodbye to her children in Terms of Endearment?
sentences.cn: 黛博拉威格在《亲蜜关系》中得跟她的孩子们说再见的样子?

sentences.en: Her eyes were swimming with tears of endearment.
sentences.cn: 她的眼中充满了疼爱的泪水.

sentences.en: I knew he was in a good mood when he used this endearment.
sentences.cn: 我知道他心情很好,因为他用这个昵称来称呼我.

sentences.en: I told you you shouldn't have let her watch Terms of Endearment.
sentences.cn: 我告诉过你别让她看《亲情关系》.

sentences.en: No term of endearment crossed their lips.
sentences.cn: 他们彼此没说过爱慕的话。

sentences.en: Sweetheart; dear. Used as a term of endearment.
sentences.cn: 被人爱的人; 表示对钟爱的、亲爱的人的称呼用语.

sentences.en: This endearment indicated the highest degree of delight in the old cooper.
sentences.cn: 这个称呼是老箍桶匠快乐到了极点的表示.

sentences.en: To every endearment and attention he continued listless.
sentences.cn: 对于每一种亲爱的表示和每一种的照顾,他一直漫不在意.

sentences.en: What words have the most powerful effect on you? Are they terms of endearment? epithets? exclamations? exaggerations?
sentences.cn: 什么样的词对你最有影响力? 是表示爱慕的词语 吗 ?是形容词 吗 ?是感叹词 吗 ?还是夸大其词?

words.tran_cn: 可爱的；讨人喜欢的；引起爱情的

trans.tran_cn: 表示爱慕的话语，亲热的表示
